synopsis.text:
Miharu Sena Kanaka, a captivating and enigmatic girl, enters the life of high school student Yukinari Sasaki, who has a peculiar condition â€” a fear of women that results in hives upon contact. In a world predominantly populated by females known as Seiren, Miharu is the first girl Yukinari encounters who doesn't trigger his gynophobia.

After an unexpected journey to Seiren, Yukinari returns to Earth with Miharu by his side. Despite the complications that arise from the presence of other Seiren females, Miharu chooses to remain with Yukinari. As their bond deepens, security forces from Seiren attempt to bring Miharu back, fearing the consequences of her prolonged stay on Earth.

To further complicate matters, a mysterious individual begins shadowing Yukinari, monitoring his every move. Will Yukinari and Miharu be able to stay together, or will the forces from Seiren and the enigmatic pursuer tear them apart? Join Yukinari as he navigates the most thrilling and unpredictable chapter of his life yet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
